db.description:
- Welcome & register the guest according to the procedure

- Assign room and accommodate special request whenever possible.

- Stay up – to – date on rooms rates, packages, discounts and how to handle each.

- Review the room rates, room location, and types of rooms

- Develop knowledge about other departments, their staffing, services and hours of opreration in the hotel.

- Promoptly notify housekeeping of all late check out, early check in and special requests.

- Develop thorough knowledge of the software used in the Front Office

- File and post all charges to guest accounts.

- Use proper the telephone etiquette.

- Report any unusual occurrences and meeting taking place in the hotel.

- Follow the message handling procedures.

- Get information about the daily activities and meetings taking place in the hotel.

- Follow all safety and emergency procedures and how to act upon them.

- Maitain the cleanliness and neatness of the front desk area

- Handle and record every kind of request and complaints of the guests.

- Keep properly the accounts of the guests for their expenses during their stay and charge them upon departure or anytime they ask for it.

- Handle room changes according to availability

- Control the issue of room keys

- Give suggestions and comments to his direct superior.

- Handle in inquires of guests and give all the information required

- Prepare all the necessary forms required to carry out the daily operation

- Know cash handling process

- Complete guest check – in procedures.

- Maintain the safe deposit box

- Balance the cash, traveler’s checks, currency, credit cards received and hand them to the accounting department.

- Verify the transfer of guest changes from other departments like the restaurant

- Complete guest check – out procedures.

- Settle guest account

- Handle payments

- Prepare the records upon check – out and check – in.

- Perform other duties as may be assigned.

- Problem solving skills.
db.requirement:
Có kinh nghiệm làm khách sạn 4 sao
- Có kinh nghiệm làm tổ trưởng, trưởng nhóm, giám sát
- Khả năng đàm phán, xử lý tình huống tốt.
- Tiếng Anh giao tiếp tốt
- Biết Tiếng Nhật là một ưu tiên
- Tinh thần cầu tiến, ham học hỏi, mong muốn đồng hành và phát triển
db.benefit:
- Làm việc trong môi trường năng động, chuyên nghiệp.
- Tham gia đóng các loại bảo hiểm (BHXH, BHYT, BHTN)
- Hỗ trợ ăn giữa ca.
- Thưởng tháng lương thứ 13.
- Các chế độ phúc lợi khác theo quy định của công ty.
